title: Review of recent progress in the development of electrolytes for Cd/Pb-based quantum dot-sensitized solar cells: performance and stability
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16255-16268
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01030B, Review Article
Open Access

Bayisa Batu Kasaye, Megersa Wodajo Shura, Solomon Tiruneh Dibaba
QDSSCs owing the ability to generate multiple electron–hole pairs per photon, high stability under light and moisture exposure, and flexibility in size and composition tuning.
